Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT NOME
FROM seguros.v0movicob
 
WHERE     BANCO            = :BANCO
AND       AGENCIA          = :AGENCIA
AND       NRAVISO          = :NRAVISO
AND       NUM_APOLICE      = :NUM_APOLICE
AND       DTMOVTO          = :DTMOVTO
AND       DTQITBCO         = :DTQITBCO
AND       VALTIT           = :VALTIT
AND       SITUACAO         = '2'
/
 END SQL
